Key Match Events: Yashasvi Jaiswal, Suryakumar Yadav and Hardik Pandya stitched up the win with some flashy stroke play
India hunted down a DLS-adjusted 78-run target in just 6.3 overs
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game, which started nearly an hour late due to a wet outfield
Sri Lanka endured another middle-order collapse to settle for what proved to be a sub-par total of 161 for nine wickets
